attributes.additional_details: Have some identification of who has not been vaccinated will allow employers to insist that anyone in the public sector needs to be vaccinated to protect the majority that have. If there is a 80% overall take up of the vaccine then that is 10 million adults still capable of transmitting the disease to the sensible people. This will allow more safety in shops, pubs. restaurants and travel. Many foreign countries will do this so we as a nation will not be allowed to travel.
attributes.background: Introduce a Vaccines Passport so that the public that have been vaccinated can identify who they at risk from. We must be protected from the Covidiots.
